fields.infoText: Please provide details of any proposed absence for a continuous period of 28 days or more.

The law states that where the registered manager of an adoption support agency, a children's home, an independent fostering agency or residential family centre proposes to be absent for continuous period of 28 days or more, written notice must be given to us. We must be notified no later than one month before the proposed absence starts (or within one week of the absence occurring where there is an emergency)

fields.label: Payment
fields.infoText:
The Board of Bacs Payments Scheme Ltd (BAC) limits the maximum value of any single Bacs transaction.  Consequently HMRC are not able to collect Direct Debits in excess of £20 million. If you have a payment to make which exceeds £20 million, you need to make arrangements with your own bank to make sure payment reaches HMRC on the due date, by an alternative method such as CHAPS.

If you have already set up a Direct Debit for this tax, you don’t need to do anything else. Your payment will be collected automatically from your bank.

Otherwise, paying electronically, such as BACS, CHAPS or Faster Payments, is an easy and secure way to pay. Make sure to include your 15 digit registration number on any payment.

Sort code: 08-32-00

Account number: 12000938

Account name: HMRC Air Passenger Duty

You can avoid financial penalties by making sure we get your completed return and payment on account by the due date.

If you give incomplete or inaccurate information, we may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.

By accepting, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.
